Package com.service

Interface PaymentDAOI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PaymentDAO
    public interface PaymentDAOI
    This is a DAO interface to implements CRUD operations for objects of Payment class
    Version:
    1.0.
    Author:
    Victor Zenin
    See Also:
    BankDAOI, CustomerDAOI, AccountDAOI, BankDAO, CustomerDAO, PaymentDAO, AccountDAO

                                throws java.sql.SQLException

        id - ID for filter of query

        Throws:
